tool_description: Live prices for Gold, Silver, Palladium and Platinum in 160+ currencies including USD, GBP and EUR.
name: Live Metal Prices
title: Live Metal Prices

api_list.name: Latest In chosen currency
api_list.description: Select what you need for a smaller payload! Real-time Gold, Silver, Palladium, Platinum and 160+ currency rates based on selected Currency
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-metal-prices.p.rapidapi.com/v1/latest/XAU,XAG,PA,PL,GBP,EUR/EUR"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-metal-prices.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://live-metal-prices.p.rapidapi.com/v1/latest/{requestedsymbols}/{requestedcurrency}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-metal-prices.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
